Source: https://ratatui.rs/templates

# Ratatui Templates

Ratatui provides [templates](https://github.com/ratatui/templates) for building apps using [Cargo Generate](https://cargo-generate.github.io/cargo-generate/).

To use these, [install Cargo Generate](https://cargo-generate.github.io/cargo-generate/installation.html) and then create a new app using the chosen template:

Terminal window

```
cargo install cargo-generatecargo generate ratatui/templates
```

 [Edit page](https://github.com/ratatui/ratatui-website/edit/main/src/content/docs/templates/index.md)

 [Previous Third Party Widgets](/showcase/third-party-widgets/) [Next Component Template](/templates/component/)
